summary: Boisterous gangster kingpin Bull Weed rehabilitates his former lawyer from his alcoholic haze, but complications arise when he falls for Weed's girlfriend.
cast: George Bancroft|Evelyn Brent|Clive Brook|Fred Kohler|Helen Lynch|Larry Semon|Jerry Mandy|Alfred Allen|Shep Houghton|Andy MacLennan|Ida May|Karl Morse|Julian Rivero
keywords: prison escape|police shootout|crime boss|love triangle|death sentence
director: Directors: Josef von Sternberg, Arthur Rosson (uncredited)
title: La ley del hampa
